term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - absorbed dose of a substance
term.title: absorbed dose

item.text: Amount of a substance absorbed into an organism or into organs and tissues of interest.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2007 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
